sentences.english: There were minor improvements in the ruminal fermentation pattern when chopped forages were used.
sentences.chinese: 採用鍘碎飼草時，瘤胃發酵模式有微小改善。

sentences.english: Generally, Korshinsk Peashrub can be used in the basal feed for goat in winter-spring.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，檸條在冬春季可作爲羊的基礎飼草利用。

sentences.english: One of the consequences of stunted crops is a shortage of straw.
sentences.chinese: 作物發育不良的後果之一是飼草的短缺。

sentences.english: The development of the A3 cytoplasm in forage sorghum breeding.
sentences.chinese: 研究A3細胞質在飼草高粱育種上的利用。

sentences.english: This year, the grass hasn't performed.
As a high quality forage, alfalfa is very important to the development of dairy industry.
sentences.chinese: 苜蓿作爲優質飼草，對奶牛業的發展至關重要。

sentences.english: Alfalfa is an important forage for livestock.
sentences.chinese: 苜蓿是家畜的一種重要飼草作物。

sentences.english: Straw could be even more difficult to buy this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年要買飼草就更難了。

sentences.english: The main predisposition of occurrence of this disease lies in the seasonal changes and forage conversion.
sentences.chinese: 季節轉換和飼草料結構的變化是本病發生的主要誘因。
